#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
inline int getn(){
register int n=0, c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int pal (int n)
{
int num,j,k,r=0;
num=n;
while(n)
{
 r=r*10+n%10;
 n=n/10;
}
return r;
}
int main()
{
int t,x,y;
t=getn();
while(t--)
{
  x=getn();
  for(;;x++)
  {
    y=pal(x);
    if(y==x)
    {cout<<x<<endl;break;}
  }
}
return 0;
}
